Pokemon.title: Pokemon
Pokemon.description: Represents a Pokemon, including its identifier, dex number, name, and shiny sprite URL.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Pokemon entity.

dexNumber.description: The Pokedex number of the Pokemon.

shinySpriteUrl.description: URL of the shiny sprite image for the Pokemon.

ShinyHunt.title: ShinyHunt
ShinyHunt.description: Represents a specific shiny hunt for a Pokemon, including the number of encounters and shiny hunting method.

pokemonId.description: Reference to the Pokemon being hunted.

encounters.description: The number of encounters for this shiny hunt.

methods.description: A list of shiny hunting method IDs being used.

notes.description: User's notes for this shiny hunt.

ShinyHuntingMethod.title: ShinyHuntingMethod
ShinyHuntingMethod.description: Represents a specific shiny hunting method, including its name and any relevant modifiers.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ShinyHuntingMethod entity.

name.description: The name of the shiny hunting method (e.g., Masuda method).

modifier.description: A modifier that affects the shiny odds calculation.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

email.description: The email address of the user.

/users/{userId}/hunts/{huntId}.description: Stores shiny hunt data for each user. Only the authenticated user can access their own hunts.

/pokemon/{pokemonId}.description: Stores information about Pokemon, including name, dex number, and shiny sprite URL. This collection has global read access.

/shiny_hunting_methods/{shinyHuntingMeth.description: Stores available shiny hunting methods and their modifiers.  This collection has global read access.
